name: WoundQoL-CodeSystem
description: Codesystem for the Wound Quality of Life

concept.display: not at all
concept.definition: statement does not fit at all

concept.display: a little
concept.definition: statement fits a little

concept.display: moderately
concept.definition: statement fits moderately

concept.display: quite a lot
concept.definition: statement fits quite a lot

concept.display: very much
concept.definition: statement fits very much

concept.display: In the last seven days my wound hurt.
concept.definition: In the last seven days my wound hurt.

concept.display: In the last seven days my wound had a bad smell.
concept.definition: In the last seven days my wound had a bad smell.

concept.display: In the last seven days there was a disturbing discharge from the wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days there was a disturbing discharge from the wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days the wound has affected my sleep.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the wound has affected my sleep.

concept.display: In the last seven daysthe treatment of the wound has been a burden.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the treatment of the wound has been a burden.

concept.display: In the last seven days the wound has made me unhappy.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the wound has made me unhappy.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have felt frustrated because the wound is taking so long to heal.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have felt frustrated because the wound is taking so long to heal.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have worried about my wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have worried about my wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have been afraid of the wound getting worse or of new wounds.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have been afraid of the wound getting worse or of new wounds.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have been afraid of knocking the wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have been afraid of knocking the wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have had trouble moving because of the wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have had trouble moving because of the wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days climbing stairs has been difficult because of the wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days climbing stairs has been difficult because of the wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have had trouble the day-to-day activities.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have had trouble the day-to-day activities.

concept.display: In the last seven days the wound has limited my leisure activities.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the wound has limited my leisure activities.

concept.display: In the last seven days the wound has forced me to limit my activities with others.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the wound has forced me to limit my activities with others.

concept.display: In the last seven days I have felt dependent on help from others because of the wound.
concept.definition: In the last seven days I have felt dependent on help from others because of the wound.

concept.display: In the last seven days the wound has been a financial burden to me.
concept.definition: In the last seven days the wound has been a financial burden to me.

concept.display: Wound-QoL
concept.definition: Wound Quality of Life
